title: US presidential candidate Kamala Harris is stepmother of two: Know her family
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris has entered the 2024 presidential race following President Joe Biden's exit. As the first stepmother to become vice president, Harris is deeply involved in the lives of her stepchildren, Cole and Ella Emhoff, whom she describes as her "endless source of love and pure joy." Harris married Doug Emhoff in 2014.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris has entered the 2024 presidential race following President Joe Biden's exit. As the first stepmother to become vice president, Harris is deeply involved in the lives of her stepchildren, Cole and Ella Emhoff, whom she describes as her "endless source of love and pure joy." Harris married Doug Emhoff in 2014.

Taiwan hunkers down ahead of arrival of Typhoon Gaemi
content: Gaemi, the first typhoon of the season to affect Taiwan, is expected to make landfall on the northeast coast early evening on Wednesday, according to the island's Central Weather Administration.
summary: Gaemi, the first typhoon of the season to affect Taiwan, is expected to make landfall on the northeast coast early evening on Wednesday, according to the island's Central Weather Administration.

title: 'Blast of rock, water and steam': Hydrothermal explosion rocks Yellowstone National Park, sends dozens running for safety
content: The hydrothermal explosion happened around 10 am in Biscuit Basin, a collection of hot springs a couple miles north of the famous Old Faithful Geyser. Video posted online showed a couple dozen people watching from a boardwalk as the eruption sprayed and grew in front of them. As water and debris began to fall, they ran to keep clear, some yelling “Back up!" and “Holy cow!” People then turned to watch the spectacle under a huge cloud of steam.
summary: The hydrothermal explosion happened around 10 am in Biscuit Basin, a collection of hot springs a couple miles north of the famous Old Faithful Geyser. Video posted online showed a couple dozen people watching from a boardwalk as the eruption sprayed and grew in front of them. As water and debris began to fall, they ran to keep clear, some yelling “Back up!" and “Holy cow!” People then turned to watch the spectacle under a huge cloud of steam.

title: Can biohackers rejuvenate aging leaders like Joe Biden?
Body cam footage shows US police shooting unarmed Black woman
content: Body camera footage shows police shooting an unarmed Black woman in her home. President Biden and civil rights attorney Ben Crump criticize the killing as unjustifiable. Officer charged with murder. Calls for fair investigation and reform in policing system amid ongoing racial tensions.
summary: Body camera footage shows police shooting an unarmed Black woman in her home. President Biden and civil rights attorney Ben Crump criticize the killing as unjustifiable. Officer charged with murder. Calls for fair investigation and reform in policing system amid ongoing racial tensions.

Kamala Harris to skip Netanyahu's address to Congress; 'disappointing', say Israeli officials
content: Vice President Kamala Harris chooses not to preside over Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu's Congress address but plans to meet with him separately. Harris will reaffirm US support for Israel's security and discuss ceasefire strategies. Session to be presided over by Senator Ben Cardin in Harris' absence.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris chooses not to preside over Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu's Congress address but plans to meet with him separately. Harris will reaffirm US support for Israel's security and discuss ceasefire strategies. Session to be presided over by Senator Ben Cardin in Harris' absence.

title: When JD Vance called Kamala Harris 'childless cat lady'
content: ​Donald Trump's VP pick JD Vance is being trashed on social media as his old video calling Kamala Harris a childless cat lady has surfaced and going viral. The video is from 2022 -- from an interview that the Ohio senator gave to the Fox News as he condemned the left-liberals.
summary: ​Donald Trump's VP pick JD Vance is being trashed on social media as his old video calling Kamala Harris a childless cat lady has surfaced and going viral. The video is from 2022 -- from an interview that the Ohio senator gave to the Fox News as he condemned the left-liberals.

title: Donald Trump reacts to Kimberley Cheatle resigning: 'I was forced to...'
content: Former US president Donald Trump reacted to Secret Service director Kimberly Cheatle finally resigning taking the responsibility for the security breach at Trump's rally and said he was forced to take a bullet for democracy. "The Biden/Harris Administration did not properly protect me, and I was forced to take a bullet for Democracy. IT WAS MY GREAT HONOR TO DO SO!" Trump posted on Truth Social after Kimberly gave in to the bipartisan call for resignation.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump reacted to Secret Service director Kimberly Cheatle finally resigning taking the responsibility for the security breach at Trump's rally and said he was forced to take a bullet for democracy. "The Biden/Harris Administration did not properly protect me, and I was forced to take a bullet for Democracy. IT WAS MY GREAT HONOR TO DO SO!" Trump posted on Truth Social after Kimberly gave in to the bipartisan call for resignation.

title: Secret Service director Kimberly Cheatle resigns under fire over Trump shooting
content: US Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle has tendered her resignation coming under fire over the recent assassination attempt of former President Donald Trump, CNN reported. The move came a day after lawmakers grilled her over the agency's handling of Trump's protection at the Pennsylvania rally where a shooter fired at Trump.
summary: US Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle has tendered her resignation coming under fire over the recent assassination attempt of former President Donald Trump, CNN reported. The move came a day after lawmakers grilled her over the agency's handling of Trump's protection at the Pennsylvania rally where a shooter fired at Trump.

title: July 21 recorded as hottest day, breaks previous records
content: On Sunday, July 21, a record 17.09°C was reached, exceeding July 2023’s 17.08°C. Copernicus reported 13 months of rising temperatures. Heatwaves hit the U.S., Russia, and Europe due to climate change, El Nino (ending in April), and fossil fuels. Reuters suggested 2024 might be hotter. In 2022, records were set for four consecutive days.
summary: On Sunday, July 21, a record 17.09°C was reached, exceeding July 2023’s 17.08°C. Copernicus reported 13 months of rising temperatures. Heatwaves hit the U.S., Russia, and Europe due to climate change, El Nino (ending in April), and fossil fuels. Reuters suggested 2024 might be hotter. In 2022, records were set for four consecutive days.

title: Dubai princess Sheikha Mara's first post after divorcing husband on Instagram
content: ​Dubai princess Sheikha Mahra bint Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum who divorced her husband on Instagram posted a photo with her two-month old daughter after making headlines for her divorce. The princess and her two-month-old have been captured in front of a portrait of a horse. The princess did not write any caption but posted a white heart symbol.
summary: ​Dubai princess Sheikha Mahra bint Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum who divorced her husband on Instagram posted a photo with her two-month old daughter after making headlines for her divorce. The princess and her two-month-old have been captured in front of a portrait of a horse. The princess did not write any caption but posted a white heart symbol.

title: Wildfires near Canada's Jasper National Park prompt evacuation; fleeing vehicles clog highways
Kamala Harris slammed for not having children: 'Becoming step-parent doesn't...'
content: ​Kamala Harris has been subjected to trolling, sexist, racial slur ever since she became the vice president. Now that she is a probable in the race for the US president post, the attacks have been doubled in the last two days and she is even berated for being 'childless'. In fact, Trump's VP pick JD Vance in 2021 called Kamala Harris a childless cat lady.
summary: ​Kamala Harris has been subjected to trolling, sexist, racial slur ever since she became the vice president. In fact, Trump's VP pick JD Vance in 2021 called Kamala Harris a childless cat lady.

title: Obama hasn't openly endorsed Kamala Harris yet because...
content: ​Former US President Barack Obama has not yet openly said anything in support of Kamala Harris -- the probable Democratic presidential nominee after Joe Biden opted out of the race. But according to a New York Times piece by Glenn Thrush, this is not a snub from Obama to Kamala, but a calculated decision -- driven by several factors.
summary: ​Former US President Barack Obama has not yet openly said anything in support of Kamala Harris -- the probable Democratic presidential nominee after Joe Biden opted out of the race. But according to a New York Times piece by Glenn Thrush, this is not a snub from Obama to Kamala, but a calculated decision -- driven by several factors.
